name: tm52
effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
